Title: Relates to increasing penalties for insurance fraud, mandating investigations, and enhancing accountability for state agencies and offices responsible for insurance fraud prevention
Summary: Relates to increasing penalties for insurance fraud, mandating investigations, and enhancing accountability for state agencies and offices responsible for insurance fraud prevention.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to mandating investigations and enhancing accountability for state agencies and offices responsible for insurance fraud prevention; and to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing penalties for insurance fraud
